file_content.text: This is Imperial property! Freeze!
I already tried that on Hoth. It's not for me.
I don't like freezing.
Heh heh. I've been to Hoth. That's kind of funny....
If I listen, does that mean you won't shoot me? Because that seems out of character.
Will that help?
Good point. Don't we usually shoot them anyway...?
Shut up!
Let's not do anything too hasty....
This isn't what it looks like.
Aww, look, boss. I think we scared her.
Aww, look, boss. I think he's scared.
You've got two seconds to clear out before I start shooting.
Back off.
You start shooting? I don't think you count so good....
Spar, you take point here. Try to take them alive.
Spar, you get this one. Try to take her alive.
Spar! Time to get some use out of you. Try to take him alive.
You didn't say "please."
You want to take out the rest of these idiots? We need to talk privately.
